name: Acceleris
description: Acceleris is an integrated PR and Communications agency that has gone from start-up to being multi-award winning, national and international agency with offices in Yorkshire and central London and working in nine European countries in seven years. It provides a comprehensive range of services to major clients in the public, private and third sectors across the UK and, as of last year, in Europe. The agency reinforced its reputation for delivering innovative, creative, high quality work.
